webapp.name: Weaget
webapp.description: Get accurate minutely, hourly, and daily weather forecasts for any location with our advanced weather website. Stay informed about current conditions, temperature, precipitation, wind, and more. Plan your day with confidence!

suggestedLocations.title: Suggeted Locations
suggestedLocations.description: Click on any card for more weather details!

pollutionCaution.moderate: Active children and adults, and people with respiratory disease, such as asthma, should limit prolonged outdoor exertion.
pollutionCaution.unhealthySensitive: Active children and adults, and people with respiratory disease, such as asthma, should limit prolonged outdoor exertion.
pollutionCaution.unhealthy: Active children and adults, and people with respiratory disease, such as asthma, should avoid prolonged outdoor exertion; everyone else, especially children, should limit prolonged outdoor exertion
pollutionCaution.veryUnhealthy: Active children and adults, and people with respiratory disease, such as asthma, should avoid all outdoor exertion; everyone else, especially children, should limit outdoor exertion.
pollutionCaution.hazardous: Everyone should avoid all outdoor exertion.

pollutionHealth.good: Air quality is considered satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk
pollutionHealth.moderate: Air quality is acceptable; however, for some pollutants there may be a moderate health concern for a very small number of people who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.
pollutionHealth.unhealthySensitive: Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. The general public is not likely to be affected.
pollutionHealth.unhealthy: Everyone may begin to experience health effects; members of sensitive groups may experience more serious health effects.
pollutionHealth.veryUnhealthy: Health warnings of emergency conditions. The entire population is more likely to be affected.
pollutionHealth.hazardous: Health alert: everyone may experience more serious health effects.

pollutionParticleDescription.pm25: particles with a diameter of 2.5 micrometres or less
pollutionParticleDescription.pm10: particles with a diameter of 10 micrometres or less

dailyWeatherCard.title: Daily cards
dailyWeatherCard.description: Click any card below to see more detailed description of the weather card.

locationGrid.title: Suggested locations
locationGrid.description: Click on a location for more weather details!

weatherStrip.expand: Expand accordion to view all weather details
weatherStrip.collapse: Collapse accordion to hide weather details

error.internalServerError: Internal Server Error. Please try again later!
error.invalidCurrentLocation: Could not retrieve current location. Please enter it manually!

thunderstorm.title: Thunderstorm

sun.title: Sun

snowCloud.description: Light gray clouds with acommpanying snow flakes.
